name: NFTs as Performance Art with Andrew Wang of Devotion.xyz | OBI #1

metadata.name: NFTs as Performance Art with Andrew Wang of Devotion.xyz | OBI #1 1/15
metadata.description:
One Big Idea Podcast Episode 1

Each week I bring on the brightest creators, builders, and thought leaders to explore the intersection of crypto and culture.

In the inaugural episode, I sit with Devotion.xyz co-founder Andrew Wang to discuss the studio's first project, Splat. During our conversation, we discuss how NFTs can create a vehicle for performance art where holders treat their collectibles as admission tickets.

properties.name: NFTs as Performance Art with Andrew Wang of Devotion.xyz | OBI #1
